snippet: Mistakes led to entertaining games at both the Grand Prix event in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, and the London Chess Classic.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column observes that mistakes led to entertaining games at both the Grand Prix event in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, and the London Chess Classic.
lead_paragraph: Mistakes led to entertaining games at both the Grand Prix event in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, and the London Chess Classic.

headline.seo: Chess: Grand Prix Features Exciting Draw
